news.title: Campo magnético de Mercurio se creó hace 4.000 millones de años

news.title: Ancient Mercury Had Magnetic Field
news.summary: Ken Croswell, Science News In the 1970s, the first spacecraft to Mercury surprised scientists by discovering that the small world sports a global magnetic field, something Venus and Mars both lack.
